link.note: Code repository for this tool, as well as instructions on use.

summary.description:
RootNav 2.0 is a software tool for the quantification of root system architectures in a range of plant species, grown and imaged in variety of ways.

The software is driven by deep learned segmentation, followed by path finding. Measurements can be exported directly in RSML format, where additional traits can be calculated later using simple plug-in system.
summary.name: Rootnav 2.0
